snippet: In the final stages of preparation for a new solo show, Judith Bernstein invited T into her Chinatown home, where she also works (and reads The New York Times).
abstract: In the final stages of preparation for a new solo show, Judith Bernstein invited T into her Chinatown home, where she also works (and reads The New York Times).

headline.main: In the Studio With a Cat-Loving, Genitalia-Painting, 72-Year-Old Artist
